        public ContactInfo(java.lang.String fullName,

        Chains to this(String firstName, String lastName, String phoneNumber, String organization) ContactInfo constructor below

        firstName - for a first name of contact info (reference type: String)
        lastName - for a last name of contact info (reference type: String)
        phoneNumber - for a phone number of contact info (reference type: String)

      • setPhoneNumber

        public void setPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Sets phoneNumber

        Only sets the phone number if the phoneNumber argument value is of an acceptable format
        Phone number format must be like 123-123-1234
        3 blocks of numbers, separated by "-", 10 digits total (String of length 12).

        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - (reference type: String)
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - for invalid string length or missing "-"
        BadRoomBookingException - for invalid number if digit blocks (not 3)
        BadRoomBookingException - if any of the digit blocks do not contain digits (catches a NumberFormatException)

      • getPhoneNumber

        public java.lang.String getPhoneNumber()
        Get the stored value of the phoneNumber private field
        Returns:
        phoneNumber (reference type: String)

      • setOrganization

        public void setOrganization(java.lang.String organization)
        Sets organization

        Incoming data cannot be null, but it can be blank

        Parameters:
        organization - (reference type: Calendar)

      • getOrganization

        public java.lang.String getOrganization()
        Get the stored value of the organization private field
        Returns:
        organization (reference type: String)

      • verifyName

        public boolean verifyName(java.lang.String name)
        Verifies the format of a name (used to set firstName and lastName)

        A name:

        • cannot be null or blank
        • must have only alphabetic characters, or "-", "'", and "."
        • must be 30 characters or less
        Parameters:
        name - (reference type: String)
        Returns:
        true for not having any errors (primitive type: boolean)
        Throws:
        BadRoomBookingException - for any non-alphabetic charters (other than "-", "'", and ".")
        BadRoomBookingException - for string length greater than 30

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a compiled string of all contact info with formatting, omitting organization if that field is blank
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        formatted contact info data (reference type: String)
